title: My Foster Son Won't Forgive His Mom
description:
Steven wants to encourage his foster son to have goodwill toward his bio-mom even though she's never been a positive force in his life. - Dr. Laura: "People need to come to terms with the reality of their situations."

Is there someone in your life who filled the role of surrogate parent? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
